paragraph.paragraph: The feature tree gives a summary of all the features of the currently edited class. They are in the same order as they are in the class file, and they are grouped by their feature clause.
The icon relative to the feature clause indicates the export status of the features inside it:

list.item: /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_feature_clause_any.gif means features are exported to all classes
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_feature_clause_some.gif means features are exported to some classes

paragraph.paragraph: The icon on the features indicates the nature of the feature:

Clicking a feature or a feature clause in the tree centers the editor on it. Key navigation is also available. All features can be
